video.title: Samurai chanpurû
video.synopsis: After a waitress saves two warriors from execution, she demands that they accompany her on a journey to find "a samurai who smells of sunflowers."

episodes.synopsis: Fuu is a waitress whose life changes forever when two vagabond warriors stumble into her teahouse and end up in hot water with the local magistrate.
episodes.title: Tempestuous Temperaments

episodes.synopsis: When Mugen wounds an enemy's arm, it sets off a dangerous chain reaction. Fuu is kidnapped, and two assassins are dispatched to snuff Mugen and Jin.
episodes.title: Redeye Reprisal

episodes.synopsis: After leaving the domineering Fuu behind, Mugen and Jin arrive in town, where they're hired on as bodyguards by the two clans that run the city.
episodes.title: Hellhounds for Hire: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mugen, Jin and Fuu's reunion is put on hold when an untimely mistake intensifies the struggle between two clans fighting for control of one city.
episodes.title: Hellhounds for Hire: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An unknown artist hires Fuu for a private modeling session, but his passion for painting turns out to be a front for a human trafficking ring.
episodes.title: Artistic Anarchy

episodes.synopsis: Mugen and Jin lose their weapons -- and their appetites -- in an rice-eating contest, and the only way to get them back is by posing as tour guides.
episodes.title: Stranger Searching

episodes.synopsis: Fuu gets caught in a web of deception when she falls for a prolific pickpocket with a heart of gold.
episodes.title: A Risky Racket

episodes.synopsis: A sword-slinger with a crush on Fuu dishes the dirt on Jin's disgraceful past. To restore his good name, Jin will need to get ready for a throw down!
episodes.title: The Art of Altercation

episodes.synopsis: The crew is headed for the gallows after getting caught using fake travel permits, but Mugen can save them by outhustling a gang of warrior priests.
episodes.title: Beatbox Bandits

episodes.synopsis: Mugen takes his training to the next level in preparation for a full-moon death match with a killer who uses a deadly armor-piercing attack.
episodes.title: Lethal Lunacy

episodes.synopsis: Jin falls in love with a suicidal beauty whose husband sold her into slavery, and Mugen tries to make his fortune in beetle sumo wrestling.
episodes.title: Gamblers and Gallantry

episodes.synopsis: When Mugen and Jin do the unthinkable and read Fuu's diary, they are treated to a riveting recap of all their greatest misadventures.
episodes.title: The Disorder Diaries

episodes.synopsis: When Mugen crosses paths with a face from his past, he reluctantly signs on for a heist that could land him a fortune in stolen gold.
episodes.title: Misguided Miscreants: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Double-crossed and headed for the bottom of the ocean, Mugen flashes back to his life before he died for the first time.
episodes.title: Misguided Miscreants: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Mugen goes under the covers with an undercover investigator who's out to put the smack down on a murderous ring of counterfeiters.
episodes.title: Bogus Booty

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare, harsh words are exchanged and the gang splinters. Mugen and Jin wander into some swordplay, and Fuu ends up at the bottom of a river.
episodes.title: Lullabies of the Lost: Verse 1

episodes.synopsis: Tempers flare and the gang splinters. Mugen and Jin wander into some swordplay, and Fuu ends up at the bottom of a river.
episodes.title: Lullabies of the Lost: Verse 2

episodes.synopsis: Mugen learns his letters from a sake-guzzling maniac; Jin makes good on a promise; and Fuu sparks a jealous showdown between two graffiti artists.
episodes.title: War of the Words

episodes.synopsis: Fuu harbors a female fugitive who may hold the key to finding the samurai who smells like sunflowers.
episodes.title: Unholy Union

episodes.synopsis: Mugen defends the honor of a blind songstress, but when the trio of wanderers becomes a quartet, Fuu will be faced with an impossible decision.
episodes.title: Elegy of Entrapment: Verse 1

episodes.synopsis: Mugen has his own deadly run-in with the same blind beauty that sent Jin plummeting toward a gruesome end. Who is this seductive assassin?
episodes.title: Elegy of Entrapment: Verse 2

episodes.synopsis: Jin, Mugen and Fuu fall into the clutches of a horde of rotting zombie treasure hunters. Next, they get blown to oblivion by an asteroid.
episodes.title: Cosmic Collisions

episodes.synopsis: Mugen's attempt to dodge a restaurant bill lands him in hot water with the locals. Redemption lies with leading the town's baseball team to victory.
episodes.title: Baseball Blues

episodes.synopsis: As the crew draws nearer to their final destination, Fuu makes a bold, startling decision. Elsewhere, unnamed adversaries pursue the traveling trio.
episodes.title: Evanescent Encounter: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jin enters a bloody grudge match with the man responsible for the ruin of his rep. Meanwhile, Mugen races to save Fuu from a sadistic madman.
episodes.title: Evanescent Encounter: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Old scores are finally settled as Mugen, Jin and Fuu come face-to-face with the ghosts of their respective pasts.
episodes.title: Evanescent Encounter: Part 3
